name: Mario Pinball Landâ„¢
description: The funfair has arrived, and one particular attraction is making news around the Mushroom Kingdom. The Spherifier can transform anyone into a ball and shoot them out of a cannon. But as Princess Peach steps up for her turn, it becomes a ride of horrors when scheming Goombas aim her right at Bowser's doorstep. It's Mario to the rescue! Roll, ricochet, and cannonball Mario through five different worlds as he slams into enemies and his surroundings. Complete challenges to obtain stars, and open up new paths to explore. At the end of the road, you'll have to face the one and only Bowser! If you want an even bigger challenge, try and collect all of the stars!
